GENERAL WEATHER FORECAST FOR SRI LANKA

බ

විට වැසි හ ෝ ගිගුරුම් සහිත වැසි ඇති වන අතර ඇතැම් ස්ථානවලට මි.මී. 75 ට වැඩි තරමක තද වැසි ඇතිවිය  ැක.

දි

GENERAL WEATHER FORECAST FOR NEXT 36 HOURS
Issued at 04.00 p.m. on 13 October 2024

S
howers or thundershowers will occur at times in Western, Sabaragamuwa, North-western and Northern
provinces and in Galle, Matara, Kandy and Nuwara-Eliya districts. Fairly heavy showers above 75mm are
likely at some places.

S
howers or thundershowers will occur at several places elsewhere during the evening or night.

T
he general public is kindly requested to take adequate precautions to minimize damages caused by temporary
localized strong winds and lightning during thundershowers.
